channel.title: URGENT- first server in making
channel.description: guys i need help like badly im making my first server and i dont know alot of stuff, before i was able to turn the server on and stuff but now when i press run it say "server already in use" on the cmd that pops up. Also when i go to compile it says like "the system cannot find the path specified" is that bad guys please i need help badly <3333 :confused:

lol thanks man but would u mind just giving me a hand ? like teamveiwing me?

item.title: URGENT- first server in making
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

"Server Already in use’
If you already ran it before, and you closed out of it. It sometimes does not close fully. Open up task manager and end all java processes. Try Re-Running it then.

Also for the
“The System cannot find the path specified”
Set the path to your JDK bin.

For example if it say,

or

Replace the Java
with

if it says javac

Note: These are the paths on my pc. They vary with different types of OS. Replace it with your paths.

Read full topic
